title: 1B1B Master BR in New Townhouse - safe & peaceful, miles of trails
posting_body: Here is a rare opportunity for you to enjoy a new townhouse located in a community of several hundreds of new homes and in close proximity to two full-featured shopping centers - The Plant and Oakridge mall, as well as major commuter routes of highway 87, 280, 85 and Capitol Expressway.
It is only five miles south of downtown San Jose where Google is  building a massive campus and BART will be extended to downtown.
This new home has modern design and is energy efficient.
Be the lucky one to enjoy this townhouse in a nice and uniform neighborhood!
The room for rent is a master bedroom on the second floor.
You have a full walk-in closet, a bathroom with a dual sink vanity, and a separate toilet closet.
The bedroom and living room have multiple windows which give you great natural light.
This is one of the safest neighborhoods in the area.
You'll be enjoying the healthy life style, fresh air, beautiful landscaping designed for luxury homes and city lights of San Jose.
The location has easy access to the major bay area cities and facilities:
, easy connections to the South Bay locations.
, convenient commute to San Francisco, the Peninsula and Gilroy.
- Miles of walking, jogging & biking trails right in the neighborhood and the Los Alamitos Creek Trail & Waterford Park nearby.
- 240V outlet in garage for electric cars
- High-end water softener - removes hard water minerals and harmful contaminants
- Tankless hot water heater - never runs out of hot water
Rental Policy: No Smoking, No Pets.
$1590/mo with a 6 month or 1 year lease.
If this could be a good fit for you, please reply by email with an introduction about yourself and your phone number for further communication.
